name.str: Break into armory to retrieve valued possession

dialogue.describe: I need you to get my riches from the armory safe.
dialogue.offer: I left my most valued possession in the armory.  I don't have the code, can you get in?
dialogue.accepted: Thanks, it's great to see someone willing to help a out.
dialogue.rejected: Well, I'll find someone else to do it for me, real shame with all those guns locked up tooâ€¦
dialogue.advice: You look like a resourceful sort, maybe you can hack it or something.
dialogue.inquire: Got it?  Should've been in my gun safe.
dialogue.success: Thanks!  I'll be sure to put in a good word for you around town.
